heading: Our Story
paragraphs: YoYo Bubble Tea is a family-owned food truck bringing refreshing bubble tea and delicious treats to Georgetown, Texas and surrounding areas. We put ourselves into everything we do, and that includes the quality of the food we serve.

Our menu features personalized boba tea with 20+ drink flavors, from classic Milk Tea and Taro to unique options like Lavender, Tiramisu, and Rose. Choose traditional tapioca pearls or try our variety of popping boba flavors for a fun twist.

But we're more than just bubble tea! Try our signature bubble waffles, waffle sandwiches, specialty hotdogs, and fresh-squeezed lemonade. Whether you catch us at a local event or book us for your private party, we're here to make your day a little sweeter.
